issue.title: [Python] Add PYARROW_BUILD_PLASMA option like Parquet
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1289](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1289). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I found in some routine testing that if I have build C++ libraries with Plasma but do not pass `--with-plasma` or set `PYARROW_WITH_PLASMA` env variable, that the test suite will fail. We should make this optional extension behave like the Parquet extension
